item.source: My flax spinner! I used it for 81 crafting (H)

item.title: My flax spinner! I used it for 81 crafting (H)
item.dc:creator: @tonekray tonekray
item.description:
@tonekray wrote:

That looks a lot like HatlessCows script…

That is HatlessCows you just changed some writeln text…

[code]{Seers Flax SPinner By HatlessCow
-Start in bank
-Flax first bank slot
-Easy
}
program FlaxSpinner;
{.include library.txt}
{.include par.txt}
{.include boxbreaker.txt}

const
LampSkill = ‘fletching’;
Flax = 1720;//Number of flax to spin

var MakeX,StringsMade,sst,cst,wst,wet,awt,srt,tih,tim,tis:integer;
FlaxGone:boolean;

procedure ProgReport;
begin
Writeln(’-----===Flax Spinner By HatlessCow===-----’);
Writeln(’--------=====Progress Report=====---------’);
cst:=getsystemTime;
srt:=(cst-sst)/1000;
tih:=srt/3600;
tim:=(srt/60)-tih60;
tis:=srt-tim60-tih*3600;
awt:=wet-wst;
Writeln(‘Worked for ‘+inttostr(tih)+’ Hours ‘+inttostr(tim)+’ Minutes ‘+inttostr(tis)+’ Seconds’);
Writeln(‘Average Spinning Time: ‘+inttostr(awt/1000)+’ Seconds’);
Writeln(‘Crafted ‘+inttostr(StringsMade)+’ Strings’);
Writeln(‘Making Approximately ‘+inttostr(StringsMade/(srt/60))+’ Strings Per Minute’);
Writeln(‘Making Approximately ‘+inttostr((StringsMade/(srt/60))*60)+’ Strings Per Hour’);
Writeln(’--------=====Progress Report=====---------’);
end;

function FindObj(objtext:string; objcolor,tol:integer):boolean;
var ax,ay:integer;
xi,yi,TempHold2,i,TempHold:extended;
begin
if(FindColorTolerance(x,y,objcolor,1,1,514,336,tol))then
begin
ax:=257; ay:=168;
repeat
i:=i+1
yi:=0;
repeat
yi:=yi+1;
TempHold:=Trunc(i/2);
TempHold2:=i/2;
if(TempHold=TempHold2)then
begin
ay:=ay+10;
end else ay:=ay-10;
if(FindColorTolerance(x,y,objcolor,ax-5,ay-5,ax+5,ay+5,tol))then
begin
MMouse(x,y,1,1);
wait(450);
if(IsTextAt2(9,9,objtext,100))then
result:=true;
end;
until(yi=i)or(result=true)
xi:=0;
repeat
xi:=xi+1;
TempHold:=Trunc(i/2);
TempHold2:=i/2;
if(TempHold=TempHold2)then
begin
ax:=ax+10;
end else ax:=ax-10;
if(FindColorTolerance(x,y,objcolor,ax-5,ay-5,ax+5,ay+5,tol))then
begin
MMouse(x,y,1,1);
wait(450);
if(IsTextAt2(9,9,objtext,100))then
result:=true;
end;
until(xi=i)or(result=true)
until(ax>=514)or(result=true)
end;
end;

Procedure MouseFlag(x,y,rx,ry:integer);
begin
Mouse(x,y,rx,ry,true);
Flag;
wait(600);
end;

procedure CheckLeveled;
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
wait(500);
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
wait(300);
end;
end;
end;

procedure RunDir(Direction:integer);
begin
if(Direction=1)then
MouseFlag(650,50,1,1);
if(Direction=2)then
MouseFlag(614,85,1,1);
if(Direction=3)then
MouseFlag(678,85,1,1);
if(Direction=4)then
MouseFlag(650,118,1,1);
end;

procedure RunFromFight;
begin
Run(true);
RunDir(4);
wait(8000);
RunDir(1);
end;

function Fight:boolean;
begin
if(FindColorSpiral(x,y,65280,216,115,284,171))then
Result:=true;
end;

procedure Randoms;
begin
Check4Randoms;
if(Fight)then
RunFromFight;
CheckLeveled;
FindBox;
Check4lamp(Lampskill);
end;

procedure Bank;
begin
Randoms;
repeat
OpenBank;
wait(500);
until(BankScreen)
if(not getcolor(102,81)=12301912)then
FlaxGone:=true;
if(not flaxgone)then
begin
Mouse(627,228,3,3,false);
GetMousePos(x,y);
wait(400);
Mouse(x,y+72,1,1,true);
wait(350);
Mouse(92,78,3,3,false);
GetMousePos(x,y);
wait(400);
Mouse(x,y+69,1,1,true);
wait(400);
end;
repeat
wait(100);
CloseWindow;
until(not BankScreen)
Randoms;
end;

procedure ToSpinningWheel;
var iran:integer;
begin
randoms;
iran:=random(2)+1;
if(iran=1)then
begin
MouseFlag(636,146,0,0);
MouseFlag(641,107,0,0);
end;
if(iran=2)then
begin
MouseFlag(654,119,0,0);
MouseFlag(640,137,0,0);
MouseFlag(628,79,0,0);
end;
if(iran=3)then
begin
MouseFlag(639,118,0,0);
MouseFlag(636,135,0,0);
end;
MMouse(235,157,1,4);
wait(350);
if(istextat2(9,9,‘Open’,100))then
MouseFlag(235,157,1,4);
if(FindObj(‘Climb’,2509671,0))then
MouseFlag(x,y,1,1);
repeat
wait(200);
until(GetColor(643,124)=0)
wait(350);
end;

procedure SpinFlax;
begin
Randoms;
if(FindObj(‘Spin’,941190,0))then
MouseFlag(x,y,1,1);
repeat
wait(150);
until(getcolor(357,408)=12433752)
Mouse(369,419,3,3,false);
wait(650);
if(FindBitmap(MakeX,x,y))then
Mouse(x,y,1,1,true);
repeat
wait(150);
until(getcolor(255,411)=8388608)
typesend(inttostr(28+random(45))+chr(13));
wait(1500);
repeat
wait(100);
Check4Mod;
until(GetColor(721,448)=5138802)or(FindColor(x,y,65535,4,4,516,338))or(Fight)or(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))
Randoms;
end;

procedure ToBank;
begin
Randoms;
MouseFlag(368,148,1,1);
wait(500);
MouseFlag(303,237,0,0);
repeat
wait(150);
until(getcolor(636,55)=2243678)
wait(300);
MMouse(287,123,0,0);
wait(350);
if(IsTextAt2(9,9,‘Open’,100))then
MouseFlag(287,123,0,0);
MouseFlag(673,83,2,2);
repeat
Mouse(661,16,3,3,true);
until(FlagPresent)
Flag;
if(FindColor(x,y,3060683,572,8,725,160))then
begin
MouseFlag(x,y,1,1);
end else MouseFlag(266,66,3,3);
Randoms;
end;

procedure SetVBright;
begin
Mouse(682,482,3,3,true);
wait(300);
if(GetColor(718,270)=4540745)then
Mouse(717,263,4,4,true);
wait(300);
Mouse(647,184,3,3,true);
wait(300);
end;

procedure LoadBmps;
begin
MakeX := BitmapFromString(20, 5,
‘5D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D5447’ +
‘5D54475D54475D54475D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF’ +
‘0000005D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF000000’ +
‘0000005D54475D54475D54475D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF000000’ +
‘000000FFFFFFFFFFFF5D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000’ +
‘0000000000005D54475D54475D54475D54475D54475D5447FFFFFF’ +
‘FFFFFF0000005D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D54475D5447FFFFFF’ +
‘FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF5D54475D54475D54475D54475D5447’ +
‘5D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000’ +
‘5D54475D54470000000000000000000000000000005D54475D5447’ +
‘5D54475D54475D54475D54470000000000005D54475D5447000000’ +
‘000000’);
end;

begin
loadlibrary(‘Internet Explorer’);
Run(true);
SetVBright;
SetCat(‘Off’);
LoadBmps;
sst:=GetSystemTime;
repeat
Bank;
ToSpinningWheel;
wst:=getsystemtime;
repeat
SpinFlax;
until(GetColor(721,448)=5138802)
wet:=getsystemtime;
StringsMade:=StringsMade+28;
ProgReport;
ToBank;
until(StringsMade>=Flax-27)
Logout;
end.

[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: My flax spinner! I used it for 81 crafting (H)
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

Copy and paste them into SCAR, save and Run.

Flax Spinner - Workeded for me!

[CODE]{Seers Flax SPinner By Pko}
-Start in seers bank
-Flax in first bank slot
-low detail
}
program FlaxSpinner;
{.include library.txt}
{.include par.txt}
{.include boxbreaker.txt}

const
LampSkill = \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘runecrafting\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’;
Flax = 1000;//Number of flax to spin

var MakeX,StringsMade,sst,cst,wst,wet,awt,srt,tih,tim,tis:integer;
FlaxGone:boolean;

procedure ProgReport;
begin
Writeln(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’-----===Flax Spinner By milkway100===-----\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’);
Writeln(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’--------=====Progress Report=====---------\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’);
cst:=getsystemTime;
srt:=(cst-sst)/1000;
tih:=srt/3600;
tim:=(srt/60)-tih60;
tis:=srt-tim60-tih*3600;
awt:=wet-wst;
Writeln(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘Worked for \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’+inttostr(tih)+\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ Hours \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’+inttostr(tim)+\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ Minutes \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’+inttostr(tis)+\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ Seconds\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’);
Writeln(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘Average Spinning Time: \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’+inttostr(awt/1000)+\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ Seconds\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’);
Writeln(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘Crafted \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’+inttostr(StringsMade)+\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ Strings\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’);
Writeln(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘Making Approximately \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’+inttostr(StringsMade/(srt/60))+\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ Strings Per Minute\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’);
Writeln(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘Making Approximately \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’+inttostr((StringsMade/(srt/60))*60)+\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ Strings Per Hour\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’);
Writeln(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’--------=====Progress Report=====---------\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’);
end;

function FindObj(objtext:string; objcolor,tol:integer):boolean;
var ax,ay:integer;
xi,yi,TempHold2,i,TempHold:extended;
begin
if(FindColorTolerance(x,y,objcolor,1,1,514,336,tol))then
begin
ax:=257; ay:=168;
repeat
i:=i+1
yi:=0;
repeat
yi:=yi+1;
TempHold:=Trunc(i/2);
TempHold2:=i/2;
if(TempHold=TempHold2)then
begin
ay:=ay+10;
end else ay:=ay-10;
if(FindColorTolerance(x,y,objcolor,ax-5,ay-5,ax+5,ay+5,tol))then
begin
MMouse(x,y,1,1);
wait(450);
if(IsTextAt2(9,9,objtext,100))then
result:=true;
end;
until(yi=i)or(result=true)
xi:=0;
repeat
xi:=xi+1;
TempHold:=Trunc(i/2);
TempHold2:=i/2;
if(TempHold=TempHold2)then
begin
ax:=ax+10;
end else ax:=ax-10;
if(FindColorTolerance(x,y,objcolor,ax-5,ay-5,ax+5,ay+5,tol))then
begin
MMouse(x,y,1,1);
wait(450);
if(IsTextAt2(9,9,objtext,100))then
result:=true;
end;
until(xi=i)or(result=true)
until(ax>=514)or(result=true)
end;
end;

Procedure MouseFlag(x,y,rx,ry:integer);
begin
Mouse(x,y,rx,ry,true);
Flag;
wait(600);
end;

procedure CheckLeveled;
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
wait(500);
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
wait(300);
end;
end;
end;

procedure RunDir(Direction:integer);
begin
if(Direction=1)then
MouseFlag(650,50,1,1);
if(Direction=2)then
MouseFlag(614,85,1,1);
if(Direction=3)then
MouseFlag(678,85,1,1);
if(Direction=4)then
MouseFlag(650,118,1,1);
end;

procedure RunFromFight;
begin
Run(true);
RunDir(4);
wait(8000);
RunDir(1);
end;

function Fight:boolean;
begin
if(FindColorSpiral(x,y,65280,216,115,284,171))then
Result:=true;
end;

procedure Randoms;
begin
Check4Randoms;
if(Fight)then
RunFromFight;
CheckLeveled;
FindBox;
Check4lamp(Lampskill);
end;

procedure Bank;
begin
Randoms;
repeat
OpenBank;
wait(500);
until(BankScreen)
if(not getcolor(102,81)=12301912)then
FlaxGone:=true;
if(not flaxgone)then
begin
Mouse(627,228,3,3,false);
GetMousePos(x,y);
wait(400);
Mouse(x,y+72,1,1,true);
wait(350);
Mouse(92,78,3,3,false);
GetMousePos(x,y);
wait(400);
Mouse(x,y+69,1,1,true);
wait(400);
end;
repeat
wait(100);
CloseWindow;
until(not BankScreen)
Randoms;
end;

procedure ToSpinningWheel;
var iran:integer;
begin
randoms;
iran:=random(2)+1;
if(iran=1)then
begin
MouseFlag(636,146,0,0);
MouseFlag(641,107,0,0);
end;
if(iran=2)then
begin
MouseFlag(654,119,0,0);
MouseFlag(640,137,0,0);
MouseFlag(628,79,0,0);
end;
if(iran=3)then
begin
MouseFlag(639,118,0,0);
MouseFlag(636,135,0,0);
end;
MMouse(235,157,1,4);
wait(350);
if(istextat2(9,9,\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘Open\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’,100))then
MouseFlag(235,157,1,4);
if(FindObj(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘Climb\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’,2509671,0))then
MouseFlag(x,y,1,1);
repeat
wait(200);
until(GetColor(643,124)=0)
wait(350);
end;

procedure SpinFlax;
begin
Randoms;
if(FindObj(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘Spin\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’,941190,0))then
MouseFlag(x,y,1,1);
repeat
wait(150);
until(getcolor(357,408)=12433752)
Mouse(369,419,3,3,false);
wait(650);
if(FindBitmap(MakeX,x,y))then
Mouse(x,y,1,1,true);
repeat
wait(150);
until(getcolor(255,411)=8388608)
typesend(inttostr(28+random(45))+chr(13));
wait(1500);
repeat
wait(100);
Check4Mod;
until(GetColor(721,448)=5138802)or(FindColor(x,y,65535,4,4,516,338))or(Fight)or(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))
Randoms;
end;

procedure ToBank;
begin
Randoms;
MouseFlag(368,148,1,1);
wait(500);
MouseFlag(303,237,0,0);
repeat
wait(150);
until(getcolor(636,55)=2243678)
wait(300);
MMouse(287,123,0,0);
wait(350);
if(IsTextAt2(9,9,\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘Open\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’,100))then
MouseFlag(287,123,0,0);
MouseFlag(673,83,2,2);
repeat
Mouse(661,16,3,3,true);
until(FlagPresent)
Flag;
if(FindColor(x,y,3060683,572,8,725,160))then
begin
MouseFlag(x,y,1,1);
end else MouseFlag(266,66,3,3);
Randoms;
end;

procedure SetVBright;
begin
Mouse(682,482,3,3,true);
wait(300);
if(GetColor(718,270)=4540745)then
Mouse(717,263,4,4,true);
wait(300);
Mouse(647,184,3,3,true);
wait(300);
end;

procedure LoadBmps;
begin
MakeX := BitmapFromString(20, 5,
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘5D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D5447\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ +
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘5D54475D54475D54475D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ +
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘0000005D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF000000\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ +
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘0000005D54475D54475D54475D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF000000\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ +
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘000000FFFFFFFFFFFF5D54475D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ +
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘0000000000005D54475D54475D54475D54475D54475D5447FFFFFF\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ +
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘FFFFFF0000005D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D54475D5447FFFFFF\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ +
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF5D54475D54475D54475D54475D5447\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ +
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘5D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF0000005D5447FFFFFFFFFFFF000000000000\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ +
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘5D54475D54470000000000000000000000000000005D54475D5447\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ +
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘5D54475D54475D54475D54470000000000005D54475D5447000000\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’ +
\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘000000\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’);
end;

begin
loadlibrary(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘Internet Explorer\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’);
Run(true);
SetVBright;
SetCat(\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\‘Off\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\’);
LoadBmps;
sst:=GetSystemTime;
repeat
Bank;
ToSpinningWheel;
wst:=getsystemtime;
repeat
SpinFlax;
until(GetColor(721,448)=5138802)
wet:=getsystemtime;
StringsMade:=StringsMade+28;
ProgReport;
ToBank;
until(StringsMade>=Flax-27)
Logout;
end.[CODE/]

please, be nice enough if this helps you, give some rep, cause i worked HARD…[/code]
